org.apache.flink.streaming.api.collector

Class StreamCollector<OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.collector.StreamCollector<OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    OUT - Type of the Tuples/Objects collected.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collector<OUT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectedStreamCollector

    public class StreamCollector<OUT>
extends Object
implements Collector<OUT>
    Collector for tuples in Apache Flink stream processing. The collected values will be wrapped with ID in a StreamRecord and then emitted to the outputs.

    • Field Summary

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: Collector
